message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $110. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $115. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $120.50?

I understand you're close to your limit, Bob, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. How about we meet in the middle at $122.50? It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the product!
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to go up to $121. Would you be willing to accept that price?
